forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 4am, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 53. South wind 18 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 51 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between 2 and 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Heavy Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then rain between 7am and 4pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 44 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens to a symphony of rain, with the promise of heavy storms lingering in the air. The city is cloaked in a gray shroud, the clouds heavy with moisture, whispering secrets of impending downpours. The brisk south wind carries the scent of the sea and fills the streets with a restless energy, while the temperature hovers delicately around a cool 53 degrees. As the night deepens into morning, rain will dance upon rooftops and splash through puddles, hinting at a cosiness best shared indoors.

Throughout the day, the intermittent showers will continue, evolving into gentle rains before the sun is allowed to peek through the clouds later in the afternoon. Yet, the charm of the city’s fog remains elusive, as it hides behind the storm clouds, waiting for an opportune moment to reveal itself. One may find a layer of mist clinging to the hills, signifying where the marine air gently kisses the land. Given the weather, an umbrella is indispensable; a warm, water-resistant jacket would make for a comforting embrace against the chill. For those who seek refuge from the storm, a quiet café, warmed by laughter or the rustle of pages from an open book, could be just the serene escape to soak in the ambiance of a rainy day while keeping an eye on the clouds drifting above.
